Yo my gringo friends:

If you want English subtitles you probably don't have to download a whole other version of this in order to watch it. Just download an .srt file from another version. This should be a small file, maybe about 100kB and named something like english.srt (or alternately deutsch.srt or whatever). Then use BSplayer to play the movie by first opening the subtitles file, and then the regular movie file.
